page.title: 05CLUBS IN CRANHAM
page.content:
Cranham has many clubs and societies. They include regular meetings for pensioners with ,entertainments, discussions and outings. Keep fit classes are popular. The Cranham {Womens' Institute}meets every week. Many of these societies use Boyd Hall which is rather old.
There are several play groups in the area.Older children can join the{Cubs, {Scouts,Brownies or Girl Guides. Teenagers can attend one of the various youth clubs. There is a youth club at Boyd Hall and at Hall Mead School. There are also sports clubs including a golf club and the{Cranham {Rangers}football club which many youngsters are in.
